data.title: Orpheus Choir of Toronto
data.meta_description: The Orpheus Choir of Toronto celebrates 55 years of innovative choral programming to give audiences it's "expect something different" experience.
data.text:
The Board of Directors of the Orpheus Choir of Toronto is pleased to announce the appointment of Thomas Burton as our new Artistic Director.

After an intensive recruitment process, we are thrilled that Thomas Burton will take over from Robert Cooper as Artistic Director of the choir. As a renowned conductor, performer, and educator, Thomas has worked extensively with choirs across the country and is highly-regarded as being a dynamic, creative and impactful artistic leader. We are confident that he will not only build on the solid foundation that the choir has established throughout almost 60 years of producing high-calibre choral presentations, but he will also lead the choir through new and unexpected artistic avenues and collaborations.

Praised for his innovative and eclectic programming as well as his dynamic presence on the podium, Thomas Burton is in demand nationally as a guest conductor, clinician and educator. In addition to his new position as Artistic Director of the Orpheus Choir, Thomas Burton is also Conductor of the Tenor/Bass Chorus at the University of Toronto, and Artistic Director of Durham Regionâ€™s RESOUND Choir.

Read more about Thomas Burton here. Please join us in welcoming Thomas Burton to the Orpheus Choir of Toronto! Auditions are now open! It is an exciting time to be a part of this top-tier musical ensemble!
